Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Homo- \Ho"mo-\ A combining form from Gr. "omo`s, one and the same, common, joint. [1913 Webster]

homo n 1: someone who practices homosexuality; having a sexual attraction to persons of the same sex [syn: {homosexual}, {gay}] 2: any living or extinct member of the family Hominidae [syn: {man}, {human being}, {human}]
